name: Voyage Event Test
rules:
-- In a Voyage Event, you will engage in Voyages with ocassional Voyage Encounters that will test proficiencies of your voyage crew.
-- The featured crew for this event are: Horseback Picard, Ensign Kirk, Captain Janeway, C.O.P. Sisko.
-- Using any version of Picard, Kirk, Janeway, Sisko, or Federation crew will provide a bonus to antimatter and to passively gained Victory Points.
-- Using Pike's Enterprise, the U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-D, the Intrepid-Class Ship, or Federation ships will provide a bonus to antimatter.
-- You earn Event Victory Points passively by running a voyage, and actively by winning contests during Voyage Encounters. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
bonus_text: Bonus: Federation (Ship/Crew), Picard, Kirk, Janeway, Sisko

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Encounter Skip
rewards.flavor: (Voyage Events Only) Skips 1 upcoming Encounter(s), raises Reward Multiplier as if they were passed flawlessly.

rewards.name: Encounter Skip
rewards.flavor: (Voyage Events Only) Skips 2 upcoming Encounter(s), raises Reward Multiplier as if they were passed flawlessly.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Contest Crit Boost
rewards.flavor: (Voyage Encounters Only) +15 Crit Chance.

rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.
